chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

l: pos n
h: pos n
a: pos n
s: pos n
Hsa: s <> a
Hsh: s <> h
Hsl: s <> l
Hah: a <> h
Hal: a <> l
Hhl: h <> l
lt: list (list bool * list bool)

i: nat
lFD: nat
pre: Vector.t (list bool) n -> Prop
spec: Vector.t (list bool) n -> Vector.t (list bool) n -> Prop
f: Vector.t (list bool) n -> Vector.t (list bool) n
Hf: forall v : Vector.t (list bool) n, v <> f v
C2: Vector.t (list bool) n -> Prop
C1: Vector.t (list bool) n -> Prop
HC: forall v : Vector.t (list bool) n, pre v -> {C1 v} + {C2 v}
Hp: out_code p (i, main_loop)
v: Vector.t (list bool) n

Goal:
v#>s = Zero :: nil -> v#>h = nil -> v#>l = nil -> v#>a = nil -> tiles_solvable lt -> exists w : Vector.t (list bool) n, (i, main_loop) // (i, v) ->> (p, w) /\ (forall x : pos n, x <> s -> x <> a -> x <> h -> x <> l -> v#>x = w#>x)

Premises:

Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
main_loop = copy_stack s a h i ++ full_decoder a h l (lFD + 16 + i) (lFD + 26 + i) (16 + i) lt ++ compare_stacks h l (lFD + 16 + i) p (lFD + 26 + i) ++ increment_erase (lFD + 26 + i) i : list (bsm_instr n)

Notation pos := Fin.t

decoder_spec_ok : forall c h l : pos n, c <> h -> c <> l -> h <> l -> forall (q s i : nat) (ll : list (list bool * list bool)) (th tl : list bool) (lr : list (list bool * list bool)) (lc : list bool) v (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), v#>c = list_repeat Zero (length ll) ++ One :: lc -> st = (s, v[lc/c][(th ++ v#>h)/h][(tl ++ v#>l)/l]) -> (i, decoder c h l q s i (ll ++ (th, tl) :: lr)) // (i, v) -> > st

full_dec_spec_rec2 : forall c h l : pos n, c <> h -> forall (p q i k : nat) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) v, v#>c = list_repeat Zero (S k) -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, full_decoder c h l p q i lt) // (i, v) -> > (q, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> c -> z <> h -> z <> l -> v#>z = w#>z)
full_decoder_ko_spec : forall c h l : pos n, c <> h -> c <> l -> h <> l -> forall (p q i : nat) (ln : list nat) (lc : list bool) (lt : list (list bool * list bool)) v, v#>c = list_nat_bool ln ++ lc -> Exists (fun x : nat => length lt <= x) ln \/ Forall (fun x : nat => x < length lt) ln /\ (exists k : nat, lc = list_repeat Zero (S k)) -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (i, full_decoder c h l p q i lt) // (i, v) -> > (q, w) /\ (forall z : pos n, z <> c -> z <> h -> z <> l -> v#>z = w#>z)
cs_spec_rec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i p q : nat) (l m : list bool) v, v#>x = l -> v#>y = m -> exists w : vec (list bool) n, (forall z : pos n, z <> x -> z <> y -> v#>z = w#>z) /\ (l = m -> (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) ->> (p, w)) /\ (l <> m -> (i, compare_stacks x y i p q) // (i, v) ->> (q, w))
copy_stack_spec : forall x y z : pos n, x <> y -> x <> z -> y <> z -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> v#>z = nil -> w = v[(l ++ v#>y)/y] -> (i, copy_stack x y z i) // (i, v) -> > (16 + i, w)

```coq
destruct tiles_solvable as [ln [Hln1 [Hln2 Htile]]].
assert (Hpre: pre v) by (split; intros; rewrite H; auto).
destruct (HC _ Hpre) as [C1v | C2v].
- assert (Hf: f v <> v) by (intro; apply Hf; auto).
  destruct (main_loop_ok_spec _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ H Hf Htile) as [w [Hexec Hsame]].
  exists w; split; auto.
- assert (Hf: f v <> v) by (intro; apply Hf; auto).
  destruct (full_decoder_ko_spec _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ H Hf Htile) as [w [Hexec Hsame]].
  exists w; split; auto.
Qed.

original: destruct tiles_solvable as [ln [Hln1 [Hln2 Htile]]]. assert (Hpre: pre v) by (split; intros; rewrite H; auto). destruct (HC _ Hpre) as [C1v | C2v]. - assert (Hf: f v <> v) by (intro; apply Hf; auto). destruct (main_loop_ok_spec _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ H Hf Htile) as [w [Hexec Hsame]]. exists w; split; auto. - assert (Hf: f v <> v) by (intro; apply Hf; auto). destruct (full_decoder_ko_spec _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ H Hf Htile) as [w [Hexec Hsame]]. exists w; split; auto.
